title: OER-Based Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Social Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of curriculum design and experience with digital resource utilization
context.additional_context: Development of Cost-Effective Educational Programs Through OER Utilization in a Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environment, Strengthening Job Relevance for Learners in Manager/Leader Roles

learning_goals: The collaborative instructional design model can be applied to explain procedures for developing social studies curricula based on OER
Three or more OER-integrated learning activities can be planned in a VR simulation environment
Methods for systematically organizing and applying OER in learning management systems (LMS) can be practically implemented

resources: Access to OER (Open Educational Resources) databases
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
